name: Mamta Vijay Kumar
rating_txt: Excellent service by the team of Experts. They use advance technolgy while keeping their charges nominal.We got our Window AC and Split AC serviced and repaired under the price of 3k Nayeem Bhai is very very cooperative and soft spoken Highly recommended :)

name: Faizan Khan
rating_txt: I had a fantastic experience with Urban Space's AC service. The technician was professional and very knowledgeable. They quickly identified and fixed the issue with my AC unit, restoring it to optimal performance. The service was efficient, and they left no mess behind. I was impressed with their attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction. I highly recommend Urban Space for AC maintenance and repairs. They provide top-notch service that's worth every penny.

name: Harneet singh
rating_txt: I am so happy with the services your store is rendering, wish you all the very best

name: Jitendra Tomar
rating_txt: A greatly satisfying experience with M/s Digi value mart. Not only had a great shopping experience, had a wonderful after sales one as well.Truly a shoppers delight.
